script: Why, hey there, kid.
How ya doin'?
Hello, stranger!
I'm a testin' NPC, yesiree!
What-- where did you find that!?
I don't know what you're talking about.
Yes! Where! Where did you find it!?
Where what?
Kesvelt? You mean Shandra stole it!?
No... no I don't care. Just... please, return it.
You brought it back? Thank you... here, take this.
You already returned it, remember?
Return what?
Eh? ¿Quién eres?
Oh, tú otra vez.
Aún vivo, veo.
Mantengo este edificio vacío a salvo de alborotadores como tú.
Tiene un montón de nada, y es mi trabajo asegurarme de que nada de eso se vaya a ningún lado.
english: I keep this here empty building safe from troublemakers like you.
It's got a whole lotta nothin', and its my job to make sure none of it goes anywhere.

script: Nada, nothing, zilk, huevo.
Good {time_of_day}! Take a look and see what might interest you.
(To buy and sell items, simply type 'shop'. He would have other dialog, but writing is hard ;-;)
A suspicious man selling fradulent prayer tomes? I must say, young man, you'd make quite the mystery writer with some practice.
However, I fear I can't help you.
Couldn't afford what you needed? I wouldn't worry about it. Prometus's blessings can show up unexpectedly.
Come back anytime, kind faithful. Oh, and do please tell Madison I said hello.
Come again soon!
